sentences.sentence: That night was the first time I heard about him catching the carp.
sentences.translation: 这个平安夜是我第一次听他说捕鲤鱼的故事。

sentences.sentence: Benson was a normal-size carp when she was placed in the Kingfisher Lake 16 years ago.
sentences.translation: 16年前，当本森被放入翠鸟湖时，她是一条正常大小的鲤鱼。

sentences.sentence: It was because he was of an argumentative mind that in their cabin at night he permitted himself to carp.
sentences.translation: 正是因为他爱争辩，所以晚上在他们的船舱里，他才允许自己吹毛求疵。
